And here are the triplets extracted from the last text:

<Lila Hanitra Ratsifandrihamanana
1:
ere are the extracted triplets:

*Lila Ratsifandrihamanana
2:
--------------------
Text: Lila Ratsifandrihamanana:  Ratsifandrihamanana resigned on February 27, 2002, amidst the political crisis that followed the December 2001 presidential election, because, according to her spokesperson, "she was personally in favour of comparing reports" regarding the electoral controversy.
Triplets:<Lila Ratsifandrihamanana
3:
--------------------
Text: Lila Ratsifandrihamanana:  She then became ambassador to Senegal in 2002.
Triplets:<Lila Ratsifandrihamanana
